Fuzzy Machines APIÔÉÅ

fuzz.engine

The machine to run the fuzzy logic

fuzz.kernel

Inference System and Membership Function classes.

fuzz.memb_funcs

Membership function types, ranging from constant, linear or other more complex shape mapping

fuzz.operators

Fuzzy Logic Operators

fuzz.rules

AND, NOT and OR operators for fuzzy logic inference systems
